programme.title: Nosotros ustedes y hechos con los Ruíz Lara
Venga la alegría
programme.desc: Un programa de entretenimiento matutino que te alegran las mañanas, con la conducción estelar de la pareja Fernando del Solar e Ingrid Coronado, el programa cuenta con secciones tales cómo:- Ingrid habla con los peques- Cocina de Yolo- Baila con Alegría- Los especialistas- Noli y sus tips- El autobús de Danilo- Las rapiditas de Venga la Alegría- La LiliparodiaEl programa empieza con un tema bailable donde los presentadores y sus chicas bailarinas te ayudan a que te animes y llegue la alegría.Durante todo el programa se dan pistas sobre una palabra o frase que el televidente puede concursar para ganarse un premio.

programme.desc: The killing of a home intruder puts a Texas man (Michael C. Hall) and his family on the radar of the dead man's vengeful father (Sam Shepard).

programme.desc: Eight candidates cooperate in order to secure a job with a prestigious company.

programme.desc: In New York, a Pakistani native (Riz Ahmed) finds that his American Dream has collapsed in the wake of the 9/11 terrorist attacks.

programme.title: Coastlines
programme.desc: Released from prison, a man (Timothy Olyphant) stays with an old friend (Josh Brolin) and has an affair with his wife (Sarah Wynter).

programme.title: The Nightingale
programme.desc: Clare, a young Irish convict, chases a British officer through the Tasmanian wilderness and is bent on revenge for a terrible act of violence the man committed against her family. On the way, she enlists the services of Aboriginal tracker Billy.

programme.title: Closer to the Moon
programme.desc: Criminals stage a bank robbery by pretending it's for a movie shoot.

programme.title: The 12th Man
programme.desc: After a failed anti-Nazi sabotage mission leaves his 11 comrades dead, Norwegian resistance fighter Jan Baalsrud finds himself fleeing from the Gestapo through the snowbound reaches of Scandinavia.

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A physician (Samantha Morton) who keeps her dying son completely secluded becomes unhinged when she learns that her new neighbor (Natasha Calis) has secretly befriended the boy.

programme.title: Exam
programme.desc: Eight candidates cooperate in order to secure a job with a prestigious company.

programme.title: The Lost King
programme.desc: The true story of amateur historian Philippa Langley, who took on Britain's most eminent historians, forcing them to rethink the legacy of a controversial ruler.

programme.title: Four Samosas
programme.desc: When a wanna-be rapper learns his ex-girlfriend is engaged to his rival, he teams up with three other misfits to steal her wedding diamonds and win her back.

programme.title: Life Upside Down
programme.desc: Three couples who know one another are stuck at home during the beginning of lockdown.

programme.title: Biosphere
programme.desc: In the not-too-distant future, the last two men on Earth must adapt and evolve to save humanity.

programme.title: Dandelion
programme.desc: A struggling singer-songwriter falls into an intoxicating romance that leads her to a deeper appreciation of her artistic journey as she discovers a voice that is authentically her own.

programme.title: Spin Me Round
programme.desc: Flown to an Italian immersion program on her company's dime, what starts as a romantic getaway devolves into chaos.

programme.title: Rare Objects
programme.desc: A young woman with a traumatic past seeks to rebuild her life when she begins working at a New York City antique shop.

programme.title: The Almond and the Seahorse
programme.desc: An archaeologist and an architect fight to reimagine a future after a traumatic brain injury leaves them adrift from the people they love.

programme.title: Stand Up to Cancer 2025
programme.desc: Country music stars, celebrities, athletes and cancer researchers join together to fundraise for cancer research; music icon Dolly Parton appears and Sheryl Crow hosts.

programme.title: Ghostlight
programme.desc: When a construction worker joins a local theater's production of "Romeo and Juliet," the drama onstage starts to mirror his own life.

programme.title: Corsage
programme.desc: Faced with a future of strict ceremonies and royal duties, Empress Elisabeth of Austria rebels against her public image and comes up with a plan to protect her legacy.

programme.title: Monica
programme.desc: A woman returns home to care for her ailing mother, whom she hasn't seen in years.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Shere Hite
programme.desc: Shere Hite's pioneering study of women's sexuality, "The Hite Report," sells millions of copies but also triggers ferocious backlash from the media.

programme.title: Formuła 1: Grand Prix Wielkiej Brytanii
programme.desc: Dwunasta runda tegorocznego cyklu będzie miała szczególne znaczenia dla Lewisa Hamiltona. Po przenosinach do Ferrari wyniki Brytyjczyka pozostawiają wiele do życzenia, lecz zmagania na legendarnym torze Silverstone mogą się okazać dla niego momentem zwrotnym sezonu. Siedmiokrotny mistrz świata wygrał tu rekordowe dziewięć wyścigów, ostatni z nich w 2024 roku. Było to wówczas jego pierwsze zwycięstwo od ponad 900 dni! Od ponownego przebudzenia Hamiltona bardziej prawdopodobny wydaje się jednak triumf innego z Brytyjczyków - George'a Russella, jego byłego partnera z Mercedesa, lub Landa Norrisa z bardzo szybkiego w obecnej kampanii McLarena. Na Silverstone błysnąć postara się też Oscar Piastri, który mimo delikatnego potknięcia w Grand Prix Kanady pozostał liderem klasyfikacji generalnej kierowców.
